thread.title: Friday Night Rivals Week 8: Scores, highlights, recaps, and photos

title: Friday Night Rivals Week 8: Scores, highlights, recaps, and photos
text:
Friday Night Rivals Week 8: Scores, highlights, recaps, and phot - WCIV-TV | ABC News 4 - Charleston News, Sports, Weather Member Center: Friday Night Rivals Week 8: Scores, highlights, recaps, and photos Posted: Updated: Friday, October 16 2015 12:51 PM EDT 2015-10-16 16:51:33 GMT ABC News 4's Scott Eisberg and the Post and Courier's Andrew Miller make their picks on the biggest games of the week in high school football. How will they fare? Tune in each week to find out! More >> ABC News 4's Scott Eisberg and the Post and Courier's Andrew Miller make their picks on the biggest games of the week in high school football. How will they fare? Tune in each week to find out! More >> 
MOUNT PLEASANT, S.C. (WCIV) -- TruMoo Friday Night Rivals is back on the air after a week of wild weather around the state, and there were some big matchups under the lights this week. 
Goose Creek headed to Cane Bay for an all out battle that lasted to overtime while Fort Dorchester made the drive to Colleton County for the Friday Night Rivals game of the week. It was another chance for the Patriots' star quarterback to shine, too. 
Friday Night SCHSL Scores: Fort Dorchester 44-6 Colleton CountyGoose Creek 26-20 Cane BayWhale Branch 28-20 Academic MagnetBerkeley 14-20 Orangeburg-WilkinsonJames Island 13-59 West AshleyHanahan 56-14 StallGarrett Tech 6-35 Bishop EnglandSt. Johns 38-0 BurkeBattery Creek 33-16 North Charleston Lake City 34-33 Georgetown
